mainText:
I have made mention so many times that Steve Jobs is my hero. So much so, when my husband gives me the latest and greatest iGadget, he signs the card, "
from your hero!"
I never had the honor of meeting Mr. Jobs personally, but he changed my world in a profound way and I will forever be grateful. May he rest peacefully knowing he made a difference in this world and left it a better place than when he found it.
author: Stacie
